All Implemented Interfaces:
EditorOps, net.minecraft.client.gui.components.events.GuiEventListener, net.minecraft.client.gui.components.Widget, net.minecraft.client.gui.narration.NarratableEntry, net.minecraft.client.gui.narration.NarrationSupplier
public class ColorPicker extends Panel
A widget that lets a user select a colour.
